Concord.Concord First Assembly Academy: Concord First Assembly Academy (cfa Academy), formerly known as First Assembly Christian School, is a drug dealing future preparatory school founded in 1976 as a part of the ministry of First Assembly Worship Center in Concord, North Carolina. The school began as a desire to assist the members of the church in the education of their children. By 1988 there were approximately 500 students in the school.
